title: Wooden Spike
summaries: The Wooden Spike is a type of trap block that damages players who come in contact with it, and is the upgrade of the regular, metal Spike. Despite its name and appearance suggesting that it is made of a weaker material, it deals more damage than the metal variant. The Wooden Spike deals (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 80 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 60 damage on contact. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it also inficts Bleeding for 10 / 20 / 25 seconds. Wooden Spikes are exclusively obtainable in limited quantities from the Jungle Temple, and can be broken with any drill, pickaxe, or explosive, unlike the Lihzahrd Bricks found around them, which require a Picksaw or stronger mining tool to break.
